Sentencas: The transient behaviour of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) caused by load changes is investigated.
Titulo: Response of a solid oxide fuel cell to load change

Sentencas: For this purpose a step function of the current density is set to the fuel cell and the response of the cell voltage is calculated by applying a special SOFC simulation code.
Titulo: Response of a solid oxide fuel cell to load change

Sentencas: The relaxation time is strongly related to the transient temperature distribution of the solid cell structure.
Titulo: Response of a solid oxide fuel cell to load change

Sentencas: Therefore, it is in the order of some minutes depending on the design parameters and the operating conditions.
Titulo: Response of a solid oxide fuel cell to load change

Sentencas: As a remarkable result the cell voltage undershoots beyond the new steady-state value from where the relaxation process starts.
Titulo: Response of a solid oxide fuel cell to load change

Sentencas: This effect is discussed and explained.
Titulo: Response of a solid oxide fuel cell to load change

Sentencas: The transient process is generalized by introducing two dimensionless groups, the modified Fourier number, Fo, and the source term number, So.
Titulo: Response of a solid oxide fuel cell to load change

Sentencas: In terms of these characteristic numbers a simple relationship is derived to determine the relaxation time of arbitrary cell designs under arbitrary operating conditions.
Titulo: Response of a solid oxide fuel cell to load change
